meanings.definition: To hit a ball with a mallet in croquet.
meanings.sent1: She roquets the ball gently with the mallet.
meanings.sent2: He always roquets the ball accurately during the game.
meanings.sent3: The player roquets the ball, making sure not to miss.
meanings.sent4: With precision, she roquets the ball towards the target.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the mallet roquets the ball, echoing in the garden.

meanings.definition: A shot in croquet where a player hits another player's ball.
meanings.sent1: The roquets in the game can change the course of play.
meanings.sent2: He made a strategic roquets to gain an advantage.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected roquets surprised everyone on the field.
meanings.sent4: The roquets between players added excitement to the match.
meanings.sent5: The crucial roquets determined the winner of the tournament.
